summary: After the son of engineer Bill Markham is abducted by an aboriginal tribe on the edge of the rain forest, the engineer spends the next 10 years searching for him.
cast: Powers Boothe|Meg Foster|Yara Vaneau|William Rodriguez|Estee Chandler|Charley Boorman|Dira Paes|Eduardo Conde|Ariel Coelho|Peter Marinker|Mario Borges|Átila Iório|Gabriel Archanjo|Gracindo Júnior|Arthur Muhlenberg|Chico Terto|Ruy Polanah|Maria Helena Velasco|Tetchie Agbayani|Paulo Vinicius|Aloisio Flores|Joao Mauricio Carvalho|Isabel Bicudo|Patricia Prisco|Silvana de Faria|Alexandre Cappelli|Antioni Japones|Candido Silveira|Diocelio Nascimento|Fabio Da Silveira|Fernando Pires|Haroldo Da Silva Pampolha|Itakati Croaia|Jorge Luiz Coelho De Mello|Jose Ademir Dos Santos|Marcos Tuantagno|Evandro Mesquita|Nilsen Accioli|Sergio Martins|Wanderley|Wladimir Oliveiro|Ana Lucia Dos Rei|Elidia Moraes|Elisette Costa Oliveira|Ivana Barbosa Freitas|Jurema Carvalho|Walkiria De Freitas|Claudio Moreno|Antonio Rodriguez Neto|Coluene Kodwell|Delnilto Gomes|Guto Macido|Iran Magalhaes|Jandir Carvalho Leite|José Maria Carvalho|José Maria Gomes De Silva|Luiz Carlos Felix|Luis Fernando Machado|Roberto Ferreira|Marcela Toneao|Ricardo Costa De Sousa|Ronaldo Alves|Sergio Espirito Santo|Welison De Azvedo Santos
title: La selva esmeralda
